tags.description: Developed site. Gravel / pebble beach, exposed. Water at tap or water from culvert above the rec site. Road access could be rough. Parking. View. Logging camp nearby but all buildings have been removed from the site. Whale rubbing beach. Boat launch.
tags.name: Naka Creek (BCMT)

tags.description: Wide cobble beach. Some brushing in second growth forest needed. Beach camp possible at neaps.
tags.name: East of Adam River (BCMT)
